00040 #ifndef _actorgraphicssettings_cpp
00041 #define _actorgraphicssettings_cpp
00042 
00043 #include "actorgraphicssettings.h"
00044 #include "actorbase.h"
00045 
00046 #include <Ogre.h>
00047 
00048 namespace phys
00049 {
00050     ActorGraphicsSettings::ActorGraphicsSettings(ActorBase* Actor, Ogre::Entity* GraphicsObject)
00051         : Parent(Actor),
00052           ActorEnt(GraphicsObject)
00053     {
00054     }
00055 
00056     ActorGraphicsSettings::~ActorGraphicsSettings()
00057     {
00058     }
00059 
00060     Ogre::MaterialPtr ActorGraphicsSettings::GetMaterial(Whole Submesh)
00061     {
00062         return static_cast<Ogre::MaterialPtr>(Ogre::MaterialManager::getSingleton().getByName(GetMaterialName(Submesh)));
00063     }
00064 
00065     void ActorGraphicsSettings::SetMaterial(String MatName, Whole Submesh)
00066     {
00067         ActorEnt->getMesh()->getSubMesh(Submesh)->setMaterialName(MatName);
00068     }
00069 
00070     ConstString& ActorGraphicsSettings::GetMaterialName(Whole Submesh)
00071     {
00072         return ActorEnt->getMesh()->getSubMesh(Submesh)->getMaterialName();
00073     }
00074 
00075     bool ActorGraphicsSettings::HasMaterialSet(Whole Submesh)
00076     {
00077         return ActorEnt->getMesh()->getSubMesh(Submesh)->isMatInitialised();
00078     }
00079 
00080     Whole ActorGraphicsSettings::GetNumSubmeshes()
00081     {
00082         return ActorEnt->getMesh()->getNumSubMeshes();
00083     }
00084 
00085     void ActorGraphicsSettings::SetMaterialAmbient(const ColourValue& Ambient, Whole Submesh)
00086     {
00087         GetMaterial(Submesh)->setAmbient(Ambient.GetOgreColourValue());
00088     }
00089 
00090     void ActorGraphicsSettings::SetMaterialSpecular(const ColourValue& Specular, Whole Submesh)
00091     {
00092         GetMaterial(Submesh)->setSpecular(Specular.GetOgreColourValue());
00093     }
00094 
00095     void ActorGraphicsSettings::SetMaterialDiffuse(const ColourValue& Diffuse, Whole Submesh)
00096     {
00097         GetMaterial(Submesh)->setDiffuse(Diffuse.GetOgreColourValue());
00098     }
00099 }
00100 
00101 #endif
